title: [HOLD for payment 2024-07-24] [$250] Header is not displayed after reloading page on waypoint screen
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Open App
2. Tap the FAB -> Submit expense -> Distance
3. Open any waypoint
4. Reload the page
5. Press go back

Expected result: Header shouldn't disappear

Actual result: None
html_description:

Open App 2. Tap the FAB -> Submit expense -> Distance 3. Open any waypoint 4. Reload the page 5.
